name: Easter Eggstravaganza
summary: Developed by Lumpy Pudding Productions, Easter Eggstravaganza is a 3D Platformer that puts you in the shoes of the Easter Bunny himself. Help the Easter Bunny collect eggs, explore levels, and make his way to the end as quickly as possible.

name: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator
summary: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Earth 2140
summary:
The year is 2140. After numerous wars and several environmental disasters, only two world powers remain; the United Civilized States (»UCS«), covering the American continent, Western Europe and North Africa, and the Eurasian Dynasty (»ED«) covering the coherent landmasses of Eastern Europe and Asia. The damage caused by the long wars led both world powers to evacuate the population to recently built underground cities.

Australia and most parts of Africa were sacrificed during the long wars, which lasted several decades. Highly toxic biological and chemical weapons were developed on these continents, leaving them so badly contaminated, that no human life can survive there. Not even the use of robots and machines is possible. The general opinion was that these continents would forever remain uninhabitable, and they were wiped from every map. Most of the world's population forgot that this land ever existed.

Natural resources are becoming scarce and have to be extracted above ground. There have been a number of small conflicts between the UCS and the ED, the last of which escalated and became a fierce and bitter war - the final world war. Only one side can win. This final war will decide who will get the last of the available natural resources and ultimately rule the world.

EARTH 2140 is a real time strategy game involving the high tech warfare of the 22nd century. More than 50 exciting missions, an unprecedented AI, more than 100 ground units, mechs, flying units and ships, strategic orders like formations, escorts and others make Earth 2140 a high class product.

This version of Earth 2140 supports resolutions up to full HD and contains both Mission Packs (Mission Pack 1 and Mission Pack 2).

name: EasyChemistryLab
summary: Are you trying to learn chemical formulas or want to test your chemical knowledge and memory? this game is the right one for you! Get in and play to learn many chemical formulas and it's uses!

name: Earth Brigades
summary:
Aliens are invading earth!
You must take control of the troops and hold the defense line against the attackers.
Earth Brigades is a single player arcade game that will challenge your quick reflexes as well as your ability to strategize, adapt & plan ahead.

name: Earth and Legend
summary:
Join the battle in this epic RPG adventure delivered in stunning 3D.
Earth And Legend features multiplayer mode as well as single player. Team up with friends and experience full worldwide online multiplayer. The multiplayer system allows players to tag team creatures and fight alongside each other while solving quests

name: Ears of the Killer
summary:
In XX City, a new music scene is forming - it's known as "Crime Wave" and all of the songs are about committing homicide. Meanwhile in the Beach District something is stirring, coming out of the sea. Can BB and her sister ZZ outrun the New Wave? Can anything change the shape of things to come?

"Of The Killer" series no. 7, cartoon mystery horror game for You.

name: EarthRoyale
summary: EarthRoyale is a Map simulation Observer game where the game each turn chooses one of many events to edit the world map

name: Easter Candy Run
summary: Easter Candy Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your quest as a Blue Bunny.

name: Eatventure
summary:
Are you looking to become a restaurant millionaire? Want to manage a successful restaurant? Become a restaurant tycoon, earn money, level up, hire cooks & cashiers, get rich and build the biggest business the world has ever seen in this Restaurant Simulator!

Start with a Lemonade Stand, then progress to a food truck, and then a cafe. In no time you will find yourself owning your own Diner and Drive-thru!

Earth's Center of Gravity

But it remembers everyone. Even the ones who did not visit it yet." Tower Antiques is waiting for you to write your story.

name: Easter Candy Break: Head to Head
summary: Easter Candy Break: Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent.

name: Ear Hockey, a Microsoft Garage Project

name: Ean's End

name: Eat Fish, Get Achievements

The game involves moving around a 2d environment and eating smaller fish than yourself. Some fish have abilities and some change the rules of the game. Get achievements and high scores!

name: EA Classics: Syndicate Wars & Dark Omen
Earth: Revival
summary:
The post-apocalyptic sci-fi survival RPG game Earth:Revival is set in an alien-invaded world and centers around the core experience of open-world survival. It has undergone significant industry innovation and upgrades.
Experience groundbreaking advancements with its "visual revolution", leading-edge "Effortless Play and Fair Spending Reform," a collaboratively crafted sci-fi narrative, and a unique exosuit combat system. Dive into the distinct "Artificial Island" building and social mechanics...

name: Easter Bonus
summary: Easter Bonus is a match-three game with an Easter theme. To clear the levels, you must turn all the squares gold. You do this by making matches of three or more items over them or using bonus items. Later in the game, some squares are coated in ice. Items in ice cannot be moved and iced squares cannot be turned gold until the ice is removed. To break the ice, you match the item trapped in the ice or use a bonus item. You must do this before the candle on the left burns down, meaning your time is up. As mentioned earlier, there are bonus items

name: Earth of Oryn
summary: Earth of Oryn is an indie city-builder/strategy game set in a medieval world filled with story and heart. Starting from nothing, shape your kingdom according to your vision while managing the needs and wants of your people.

name: Eagle Knight Paradox
summary: Eagle knight paradox takes you (the player) into a doble experience, one of them is the role of a powerful mecha trying to protect a space city from space fanatics. On the other hand, the game sets you as the role of Ian (the pilot) building relationships around the city or whats left of it.

summary: A game about a tea party, a monarchy, and the unpredictability of language.

summary: In dependency of where in the body you are positioned, you get different bonuses. In general you will get Bone, Blood and Tissue with which you can create more bugs. In addition to that you will be able to research different bug types which have bonuses themself.

summary: EA Sports UFC Mobile is a port of the mixed martial arts simulator for Android and iOS, featuring more than seventy fighters, real tricks, and strikes, development and training of athletes, real tournaments, and awards.

summary: If you’ve ever wondered what it’s like to be a bird with wings that flies, then Eagle Simulator is the perfect game for you!

name: Eagle Simulator

Environmental damage! Don’t mix ecologics with your economics, and keep stacking up that cash no matter the cost.

summary: Make the most out the Earth Defense Force Tactical Armor with the Tactician Advanced Tech Package for Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon.

name: Earthling Priorities
summary:
Earthling Priorities is a subtle mini-adventure game, partly homaging those good ol' times when Space Quest happened and Big Brother was still considered a bad thing.

It is trying very hard to be pithy, but is mostly rather silly.

You'll point, click, solve at least one puzzle, and get to ponder the reality of your sci-fi existence; also, the importance of doors.

name: east van EP
summary: A Videogame Extended Play

name: Easy Red 2: Stalingrad
summary: The Volga River is not lost yet! Come on comrades! With Easy Red 2: Stalingrad you will expand the front to the East for the first time, in the heart of the Soviet Union.

name: Eastern Europe Train Sim
summary: The best way to visit a country is to go where cars don't go.

name: Eat Your Words: Word Puzzles
summary: Those of us who enjoy Sunday mornings with a hot tea and the crossword section know that there is nothing quite like a great word game. The combination of racking our brains because we “know this one” and the sweet satisfaction of finally solving the puzzle warms us to the core. We word game lovers are a special group of word-aholics and Eat You Words is here to give you your fix!

name: Eastern Europe Bus Sim
summary: Welcome in this bus simulator which brings you to Eastern Europe. Here, almost everything is different compared to the west, even the profession of a simple bus driver.

name: EA Sports PGA Tour: Deluxe Edition
summary: The exclusive home of the Majors, EA Sports PGA Tour features Pure Strike for superior golf gameplay powered by ShotLink, and unrivaled access to the world's most exclusive golf courses.

name: Easy Game
summary: Easy Game is a platformer game that breaks through the stage to avoid obstacles by stepping on the treadmill. The player aims to avoid various obstacles in the game and finally catch the boss monster.

name: Earwyrm
summary:
Try different tracks, and see if you can beat your friends at your favourite music.
Earwyrm always provides a reliable gameplay experience from song to song - each level is uniquely derived from your choice of music - and is the same for everyone who tries to race that music.
You don't have to wait - the level is generated in real-time as you listen to the track, and dynamically recognises changes in the music and visualises them immediately.
Earwyrm is a visceral reactive music game like no other. Play it on maximum difficulty to get the highest scores, but look out for when the bass drops!

name: EarthGang: Mirrorland
summary: Join EarthGang (Olu & Wowgr8) as they fight their way along the red- brick road from Rags to Royalty, all the way to Mirrorland.

name: Earth Rising
summary: Earth Rising - A game about building CubeSat and learning more about this small satellite and how it functions. You are in the role of a robot that has a mission to put into space as many CubeSat satellites as you can so you can find different resources for future space flight development.

name: Eaten by Darkness
summary: Fast paced mayhem in a hellish nightmare. Feel the dread of fear lingering nearby and the exhilaration of being chased by demons and undead in this bloody violent horror first person shooter. A highly detailed Unreal Engine 5 game utilizing advanced Nanite and Niagara graphics.

name: EarthRemnant
summary: EarthRemnant is a sandbox simulation game in which you will lead the Keplerians to land and build a colony on a strange planet, develop the planet's mineral resources, collect fossil, wind, solar and other energy sources to keep the colony running, and continuously increase the colony's population.

name: Earl's Minecart Adventures
summary: Blast with amazing speed through mines and caves. Break through wood, stone- and steel. Evade flowing lava, falling rocks and hazardous machinery. Race, jump, fly with amazing speed across rivers and ravines. Looping, doors, saws, fire, high voltage, rocks, traps and more.

name: EarthBound 64 Experience
summary: EarthBound 64 Recreation is a PC fangame created by Team Pollysoft. It aims to recreate the Spaceworld '99 demo of the unreleased Nintendo 64 version of Mother 3.

name: Eagle Ride
summary:
Ride on an eagle through woodland!
Avoid crashing into the trees and try to survive as long as you can in the simple classic mode.
Dodge bouncing balls and collect as many jewels as you can in the crazy mode or in the black and white hardcore mode.
Or play as the funny cat car in the cat car mode.
Beat your best time round after round in this intense and difficult endless runner.

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers - Cosmonaut: We'll Take the Planet as is!
Eat Your Fucking Soup
summary: A comedy Horror FPS about a soup company releasing a new soup at just 10 cents a can! Unbelievable value! With the economy in crisis, the new Soup offering has millions queuing around the block to fill up on cheap & tasty food. But something doesn't taste right!

name: Earthworm Jim 2
summary: Earthworm Jim 2 (蚯蚓吉姆2) is an unlicensed port of the game of the same name, made for the Famicom by a team of (or at least related to) Ex-Sachen developers and published by Ka Sheng in 1996.

name: Earthtia Saga: Larthur's Legend
summary: Action point-and-click adventure, related to the Lord of Lords: Ryu Knight series.

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: Earthworm Jim is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with action elements where the player takes control of Jim, a worm wearing a spacesuit. Jim can shoot enemies with his gun or use his body (the spacesuit's "head") in a variety of ways to overcome obstacles, such as whipping it at enemies, grappling hooks to swing from them, or making it spin very fast like a rotor to hover for a short time.

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: Earthworm Jim is a 2D side-scrolling platformer with action elements where the player takes control of Jim, a worm wearing a spacesuit. Jim can shoot enemies with his gun or use his body (the spacesuit's "head") in a variety of ways to overcome obstacles, such as whipping it at enemies, grappling hooks to swing from them, or making it spin very fast like a rotor to hover for a short time.

name: Eaves
summary: Eaves is an ancient Chinese style city building game. You can build and tear down modules as you like. There are flowing water, small bridges, pavilions, fish, insects, flowers and birds here. Lets create and experience the beauty of your own ancient Chinese villages!

name: Earth's Greatest Defender
summary: Shoot aliens in the coolest way possible using classic weapons and your grappling hook!

name: Easy puzzle: Bridges
summary: Easy puzzle: Bridges is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture.

name: Easy puzzle: Landscape
summary: This is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture.

name: Eastpunk: Journey
summary:
Eastpunk: Journey is an eastern fantasy RPG card game in which you will experience a fantastical story based on Journey to the West and embrace adventures in Grand Tang, a magnificent Eastern civilization in an industrialized world.
Thanks to the discovery of Mana, a new energy that allows humans to have power comparable with gods, the Kingdom of Grand Tang entered an unprecedented era of prosperity.
But everything has a price. As the manifestation of the dark side of this power breaks out and drives everything into madness, the seemingly thriving world starts to crumble.
In Eastpunk: Journey, you will play as the Seeker immune to Miasma journeying to the West to find salvation for a world that is losing control.

name: Eagle Eye: Find the Difference
summary: Eagle Eye is an engaging "spot it" game. Sharpen your observation skills by finding differences in stunning HD images. Play at your own pace or compete in the multiplayer mode. Enjoy the challenge and stay engaged for hours.

name: Eastern Euro Truck Simulator: Real Offroad Car Driving Game Sim 4x4 Mud
summary: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Earthless
summary: Earthless is a sci-fi, roguelike deckbuilder where humankind has been thrust into the cosmic wind on a fleet of starships captained by you. To find a new home, you must draw your own path through the stars and play the hand you’re dealt. You are our hope in the darkness.

name: Earthen Dragon
summary: The nameless dragon has left his valley to save a friend, but the lands beyond lie in ruin.

name: EA Sports UFC 5
summary: EA Sports UFC 5 is as real as it gets. Powered by Frostbite engine’s advanced rendering capabilities, your favorite fighters now have unparalleled character likenesses to complement next-level environment fidelity that’ll make their walk to the Octagon feel like a PPV main event. The all-new authentic damage system brings the intensity and strategy of a fight to life, as cuts and strikes absorbed can affect mobility, defense, stamina, and more. Take too much damage, and the doctor will check to see if you’re able to continue. For lovers of the ground game, the new Transition-Based Submissions make grappling feel more fluid and realistic than ever before. And if you like to admire your handiwork, new Cinematic K.O. Replays capture your fight-ending finishes in all their punishing glory. Plus, a completely revamped live service schedule builds exciting challenges around all PPV fight weeks. Bring the next evolution of the fight game home with UFC 5.

name: EA Sports FC 24
summary: EA SPORTS FC 24 is the ultimate football simulation game that lets you play as your favourite stars and teams in the most authentic and immersive way possible. With EA SPORTS FC, you can experience the thrill of the world's biggest competitions, such as the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Women's Champions League, La Liga Santander, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Serie A, CONMEBOL Libertadores, Barclays Women's Super League, NWSL and many more. EA SPORTS FC 24 also features a new brand identity inspired by the triangles that have been part of EA SPORTS football for the past 30 years, from the isometric polygons that make up the game to the chemistry triangles that exist in Ultimate Team to the player indicator across every match. Join the Club and be part of a new Football Club for the future of football we want to build together.

name: EA Sports FC 24: Ultimate Edition
summary: We welcomes you to The World's Game: the most true-to-football experience ever with HyperMotionV, PlayStyles optimised by Opta, and a revolutionised Frostbite Engine.

name: Earth Ends
summary: Earth Ends is a 6-map episode for limit-removing ports made by members of Doomer Boards. Thanks joe-ilya for being the lead on this one!

name: Eastern Front
summary: Eastern Front is a semi realistic multiplayer game combining real time strategy and boots to the ground fps combat. Generals command their divisions and manage war industry while soldiers go to the battle with equipment given to them.

name: EA Sports WRC
summary:
EA Sports WRC boasts 10 current WRC, WRC2, and Junior WRC vehicles and 68 of the most iconic rally cars spanning 60 years of the sport.

Working together with official WRC teams and manufacturers, such as Ford, Toyota, and Hyundai, each vehicle is built to tackle every challenge they'll face throughout the season. The hybrid-powered 4WD Rally1 cars are some of the fastest in the sport's history, capable of incredible speeds while tackling gravity-defying jumps, deteriorating surfaces, and adverse weather.

name: Eat Your Vegetables!
summary:
Who would have thought eating your vegetables would be so much fun?
Super simple, yet addictive game play! Can you tap and swipe? If so, you are qualified to Eat Your Vegetables.
Make sure to only eat your vegetables and avoid eating things like rocks, nails, jewelry, hair picks, pitchforks, lava lamps, alien ray guns, and anything else that flies at you!
Play with 6 unique unlockable characters, each with 3 levels of difficulty including; 1 & 1, Multiple Vegetables, and with Distractions! Make sure you keep your baby from being distracted by swiping or tapping away dogs, flies, disco music, earthquakes, asteroid fields, sudden thunderstorms, and UFO’s.
Try and beat your friend’s score on the leaderboard, or try to reach the highest score by eating all your vegetables.

name: Eastward: Octopia!
summary: Sam and John return in an all-new adventure! In this heartwarming story-driven farming sim, players can grow crops, tend livestock, and turn an abandoned fairground into a thriving village, with the help of the weird and wonderful cast of beloved Eastward characters.

name: Earth Saves Our Love

name: Earl vs. the Mutants

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2
summary: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 tells the story of what happened to the voxel Earth after the events of the first installment. It cleverly introduces elements from Earth Defense Force 6 and features the Wing Diver Shooter, who didn’t make it into the previous game. This latest installment is filled with more love for the Earth Defense Force series (and Earth!) than ever before!

name: Easy Red 2: Normandy

Classical Masterpiece songs that everyone has heard…

summary: Galaxian clone

name: Earthion
summary:
Earthion is an upcoming aftermarket shooting game developed by Ancient primarily for the Sega Mega Drive. Physical MD versions will be published by SUPERDELUXE GAMES in Japan and by Limited Run Games in North America. The game will also get a 16:9 version for modern platforms.

Earthion is published under the label YKGGG, a brand name covering all the retro-style games developed at Ancient. If Earthion meets success, Ancient will go on the venture of releasing video games designed for retro consoles. A separate version of the game for Arcade was confirmed by Ancient and published by exA-Arcadia, which features a new, exclusive mode that will not be available in the Mega Drive version.

name: EA Strategy Collection

name: Easy Street: A Shopping Adventure
summary:
Easy Street is an educational shopping game.
The player controls a small child who must travel Easy Street, to go to the local stores to buy the items on their shopping list. The player must choose which store is appropriate to buy the items on the top of the screen, entering the store, and choosing the correct item. On more difficult levels, the player must choose how much to pay for the item. To complicate matters, the player will get approached by Knuckles the Gorilla, and if he is able to hop onto the player's wagon, the player will not be able to enter any more stores, and must restart their shopping trip. When the player has gathered all required items, they can return home with their shopping complete.

name: Earth Atlantis 2
summary: Earth Atlantis 2 is a fast-paced post-apocalyptic shoot 'em up set in a vast sunken world ruled by monstrous machine sea creatures. Pilot a heavily armed submarine through intense Bullet Hell battles, harnessing innovative drone systems to conquer over 20 colossal bosses. Explore stunning underwater ruins, uncover hidden secrets, and battle to save humanity. With a vibrant new pixel art style, expansive Metroidvania-style stages, and fresh gameplay mechanics, the game delivers intense SHMUP action, epic sea monster showdowns, breathtaking visuals, and unforgettable undersea journey.

name: EA Sports FC 26

name: Earth Invasion 99
summary:
Earth is being invaded, cities are being torn down by those aggressive aliens. They do not come in peace and they do not negotiate.

Our only option is to fight back and defend our planet, but the situation is grim. Only one trooper is capable of putting up a fight anymore. The likelihood of complete human extinction is 99%.

Earth Invasion 99 is a fast paced shooter inspired by EDF franchise. Shoot and power up yourself to victory.

name: Earworm
summary:
In the depths below, an underground artist called DJ Earworm is struggling. Looking for a chance to prove his skills, he takes on gigs fixing the loops of various quirky producers. Your mission is to help him match the beat, combine loops into a diverse set of songs and make DJ Earworm a household name!

Earworm is a unique new rhythm game spanning multiple genres and 16 unique songs. Start with a beat, loop back around to add a lead and finish it off with a catchy melody! These randomized microgame-like challenges get progressively faster and harder, with different modifiers constantly changing the way you play the game.

Earworm was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2025.

name: Eat Repeat
summary:
It’s food-collecting time and there are so many tasty dishes you can collect!

Upgrade your skills so you can go further and collect more food dishes as you explore the depths of this world.

Are you ready to be the next King of Eat Repeat?

More than a hundred unique delicious dishes for you to catch.

Try to catch them all!

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: The Super NES version has altered graphics, with different backgrounds and special effects, but lacked some sound effects and one of the levels from the Genesis version (titled "Intestinal Distress").

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: EAT DIRT!

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: A direct port of the Game Gear version of Earthworm Jim was also brought to the Master System. However, it only has 4 levels, and the boss in "What the Heck?" is missing.

name: Earthworm Jim 2
summary: Earthworm Jim 2 was developed for the Sega Genesis and then ported over to the Super NES. They were released virtually simultaneously and were largely the same game, the only differences being that the Super NES version had alternate background art, and the ability to switch weapons.

name: Earthworm Jim 2
summary: This port featured an upgraded CD-DA music soundtrack, more voice clips and redrawn graphics, but lacked the "Lorenzen's Soil" level.

name: Earthworm Jim 2
summary: Earthworm Jim 2, received versions for the Sega Saturn and PlayStation (both developed by a separate studio, Screaming Pink, Inc.), which contained the upgraded audio and all the levels from the original. Both of these versions were identical, and contained background art and graphical differences separate from any other versions of the game.

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: A conversion of the game was also being developed by German studio Softgold and planned to be published by Atari Corporation for both the Atari Jaguar and the Atari Jaguar CD, but it was never finished due to the departure of Normen B. Kowalewski from Atari, who was the lead developer of the port, sometime between or at the end of 1995. The alpha prototype, which consisted of basic character animations, and the source code of the conversion are currently lost.

name: Earthworm Jim
summary: The Nintendo DSi version also features the same level changes and re-recorded voice. In addition to this, it also has bonuses based around face tracking challenges where you copy Jim's facial expressions in the DSi's camera.

name: Earth Taken
summary: Earth Taken is set in a dystopian world devastated by an alien invasion. The environment is heavily polluted, and the government isn't helping, forcing the player to find shelter or use a gas mask to survive outdoors. The player controls a human survivor navigating through ruined landscapes, abandoned buildings, and underground bunkers.

name: Early Kingdom
summary: Early Kingdom is an Action RPG, developed by Kure Software Koubou (KSK) for the PC-98 and released in Japan in 1992.

name: Earth Defense Sticks
summary:
Earth Defense Sticks is a fun and fast-paced 2D arcade game where you play as the planet Earth!

Asteroids are coming from all directions, and your job is to survive as long as possible. To help you, you have four powerful defense sticks — one on each side of the planet: top, bottom, left, and right. Press the matching buttons to extend the sticks and smash incoming asteroids.

Each asteroid you destroy gives you points. The more you hit, the higher your score!
Simple to play, hard to master — how long can you protect the Earth?

name: Earth Taken 3
summary: Earth Taken 3 is the final installment of the survival game where you play as a human who must lead the resistance against the alien invasion. You can use upgraded weapons, items, and vehicles to destroy the aliens and their mutants. The game has a post-apocalyptic graphics and sound effects. You can also recruit new survivors and soldiers. Can you liberate the Earth?

name: Earth Taken 2
summary: The second part of a post-apocalyptic action-shooter set in the midst of an alien invasion. Most humans and animals have already been wiped off the planet, the eco system has been altered to suit the needs of the aliens, and the air has been made unbreathable for most earth creatures, including humans. Earth Taken 2 kicks off where the first game ended. You are the sole survivor of a car crash. You have lost all of your equipment except for a combat knife and a few gas mask filters. Your mission: Survival.

name: Easy Japanese Hiragana
summary: Study hiragana as you explore Japan, also learning Japanese culture and history. By the time you reach Tokyo, you'll have learned everything you need to know!

name: Early Bird
summary: The Early Bird gets the worm... or at least it can, with your help! Control your bird with simple and intuitive gesture controls to flutter through beautiful landscapes and get past obstacles. Complete 96 amazing levels and earn achievements along the way. Can you top the OpenFeint leaderboard--and, not incidentally, get that Early Bird its morning meal?

name: Earthquake: Margarita School
summary: A horror game set in a school, in which you will be a police officer who will have to investigate an earthquake. You will have to complete puzzles and face the paranormal events that occur. You have to be careful, the school covers a fairly dark past that you will be able to discover.

name: Eastwynne
summary: Play as either Ester or Sye as they navigate college and life in Eastwynne. A city filled to the brim with magic, high society life, the best of the best businesses, and real estate. Maybe not the best people, but you got everything else.

name: Earth Must Die
summary: These moronic Terranoids think they can just roll in here and take over my beautiful Tyrythian kingdom? The kingdom that I built from the ground up with my bare hands, and only sort of inherited from my dear, sweet, extremely dead father? This is complete bullsh*t, and I'm going to make them dead.

name: Earthlings
summary:
Meet G - a space delivery guy who came for his dropped tablet but stayed for the scam. After seeing the amazing monuments humans built to worship him, he decided to exploit their creativity and sell their art as his own across the galaxy. You're his unwilling project manager, and when deadlines slip, his anxiety triggers disasters.

He's your boss, your burden, and ultimately your enemy.

Build weird monuments, meet crushing deadlines, and survive working for the universe's worst middle manager.

name: Earthling's Undertaking
summary: "Tian Di Gui Xu" is a Cultivation RPG and strategy game based on ancient Chinese mythology. Players assume the role of the leader of a declining sect, journeying through the mysterious world of Taichu, managing their sect and training disciples, seeking immortals and cultivating the truth to improve their cultivation. They explore the reasons behind the tilt of the heavens in Taichu, uncover the hidden conspiracies of the immortals, break free from the constraints of fate, and compose their own myths and legends.

name: EasyTetris
summary: Very simple casual elimination game, on the basis of Tetris, the setting is more simplified, there is no upper limit of points, no time regulation, simple and easy to operate.

name: Eagle Legacy: Zero
summary: Explore a cursed realm locked in mist and blood. Solve ancient puzzles, cast forbidden spells, and survive the Witch’s trial in this dark third-person adventure set at the edge of myth and memory.

name: Earth Space Defenders
summary: Earth Space Defenders is a starship twin-stick real-time shooter action game. Experience story of menacing green smoke that plagues whole universe. Supports steam multiplayer and party play with multiple controllers.

name: Eastern Era
summary: To escape from pursuit, as the leader of your sect, guide your disciples to rise again! Engage in farming and hunting, train in martial arts, and forge weapons and armor. Build your sect's base and fortifications from the ground up to survive in this perilous, ambition-filled martial world!

name: Easy Flight Simulator 2
summary: Take off in seconds. Explore forever.

name: Earnest Evans Collection
summary: Three classic action games return in the Earnest Evans Collection: Earnest Evans, El Viento, and Anett Returns! Can you put an end to Al Capone's evil plans and thwart the resurrection of the Dark Lord Hastur?

name: Easy Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Jigsaw puzzle game that supports uploading local images

name: Earn to Die 2012
summary: Smash through hordes of zombies as you drive your way through a zombie apocalypse, unlocking and upgrading vehicles along the way.

name: Earl the Tomb Robber
summary: After an ancient curse binds Earl to the ghost of a long deceased King, Earl must the break into the tombs and graves of the sacred island to recover the scattered mummified body parts of the cursed King.

name: Easy Puzzle: Animals
summary: This is a logical game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture. In the pictures that need to be collected, different animals are depicted
